title: Binance to Support Bitcoin Ordinals in its NTF Marketplace
text: Users will be able to buy and sell Bitcoin NFTs on the Binance NFT marketplace in the coming weeks.

title: Bitcoin ordinals hit Binance NFT Marketplace in latest update
text: The Binance NFT marketplace announced that users will soon be able to trade and purchase Bitcoin NFTs on its platform using already-existing wallets.

title: Ordinals inscriptions approach 4.8M, nearly doubling in just over a week
text: The BRC-20 token frenzy has seen the number of Ordinals inscriptions on the Bitcoin network soar 92% in 8 days.

title: ‘Unjustly enriched:’ Core Scientific knocks back  $4.7M claim from Celsius
text: Core Scientific has rejected a multi-million-dollar administrative claim from Celsius Network, arguing it's owed an even higher amount from the crypto lender.

title: Bitcoin’s Fees Explode Amid BRC-20 Memecoin Mania, Miners Benefit

title: Liechtenstein Could Embrace Bitcoin as a Payment Method for Gvmt Services, Says PM
text: An upcoming legislation could allow the residents of Liechtenstein to settle government services in BTC.

title: Does Bitcoin price risk losing $28K with BTC futures premium at 2-month lows?

title: Bitcoin takes flight in Liechtenstein: Minister proposes government services paid in crypto
text: Prime Minister Daniel Risch of Liechtenstein told local papers that Bitcoin is set to play a growing role in government services payments.

title: CashApp’s Bitcoin Sales Up 25% Since Last Quarter

title: ‘Bitcoin is not under attack:’ BTC maxis allay fears of a DoS offensive

title: Binance halts Bitcoin withdrawals for the second time in 12 hours
